name: Kickin' CyberButs
description:
Walk with A (Left) and D (Right)

Jump with W

Hold Enter or LMB (Left Mouse Button) to shoot.

Made for Cyberpunk Jam, Kicking CyberButts is the kind of hard game with a ridiculously easy boss. It's about a rebel that decides to take down the Oppressor, a computer that rules the city of New York in the year of 2093.

You can see some of how I progressed on the development here: http://nicoamaral.tumblr.com/post/78451299772/kick...

Twitter: https://twitter.com/pudimnicolas
